name: fodzip
description: HTML CSS, just HTML and CSS. In case you were wondering, no javascript.  If you have already seen the source code, then yes I do not use a lot of class or id selectors, instead I use a lot of combinators: it is then easier for me to memorize and visualize the DOM structure. I do not know what exact kind of website it is, food based, maybe. Some of the icons were not loading properly and showing an error in the console if I used a CDN link(or whatever that is called). So I had to download all of them.  None of the links work; only the night mode toggler does. It took me almost 50 hours to make the webpage.
